tool_description:
RChilli Resume Redactor API helps in masking resumes before sending them to the employer.

RChilli Resume Redactor API removes unconscious bias in the recruitment process by helping recruiters select candidates based on skills and experience.
name: RChilli Resume Redactor
title: RChilli Resume Redactor

api_list.name: Redact Resume
api_list.description: RChilli Resume Redactor API removes unconscious bias in the recruitment process by helping recruiters select candidates based on skills and experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-resume-redactor.p.rapidapi.com/redactResume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-resume-redactor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-resume-redactor.p.rapidapi.com/redactResume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-resume-redactor.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
